text:
@DanMir24432407 @navift @ImranKhanPTI No need to SMH Dan. This is not about your PM or his incompetence.  This is about how the poor will die as a result of a lockdown that is not coupled with economic support.

"Privilege" because you will not die... but the poor will. Corona may not discriminate, but hunger does.
